| History                 = The Beasts of Berlin were Gorillas with enhanced intelligence, created by Communist scientists in Eastern Germany. [[Henry Pym (Earth-616)|Giant-Man]] learned about them when he broke his old friend, [[Lee Kearns (Earth-616)|Lee Kearns]] out of a communist prison. Together, they defeated the creatures and destroyed the ray gun that had created them{{r|Tales to Astonish Vol 1 #60}}.

Years, later the intelligence ray was recreated by Communist scientists and a new group of Beasts of Berlin were created. They joined the [[People's Defense Force (Earth-616)|People's Security Force]] and captured the West Coast Avengers, they were however defeated along with the rest of the Force. {{r|West Coast Avengers Vol 2 33|34}}
